name: solar
description: Solar irradiance simulation on external surfaces
author: christophwaibel

components.name: SimplePanel
components.description: Calculates solar irradiance on an unobstructed external surface

inputs.name: DHI
inputs.description: Diffuse Horizontal Irradiance time series, 8760 values in [W/m²] from a weatherfile.

inputs.name: DNI
inputs.description: Direct Normal Irradiance time series, 8760 values in [W/m²] from a weatherfile.

inputs.name: latitude
inputs.description: Latitude of the location. Default value is for Zurich, Switzerland

inputs.name: longitude
inputs.description: Longitude of the location. Default value is for Zurich, Switzerland

inputs.name: solarazi
inputs.description: 8760 time series of solar azimuth angles in [°], e.g from a weatherfile. If no data provided, azimuth will be calculated according to Blanco-Muriel (2001).

inputs.name: solaralti
inputs.description: 8760 time series of solar altitude angles in [°], e.g from a weatherfile. If no data provided, altitude will be calculated according to Blanco-Muriel (2001).

outputs.name: annual potential
outputs.description: annual hourly solar irradiance [Wh/m²] of panel

components.name: ObstructedPanel
components.description: Calculates solar irradiance on obstructed building surface.

inputs.name: mesh_analysis
inputs.description: Analysis surface as rhino grasshopper mesh

inputs.name: obstructions
inputs.description: Obstructions as rhino grasshopper mesh objects

inputs.name: DHI
inputs.description: Diffuse Horizontal Irradiance time series, 8760 values in [W/m²] from a weatherfile.

inputs.name: DNI
inputs.description: Direct Normal Irradiance time series, 8760 values in [W/m²] from a weatherfile.

inputs.name: latitude
inputs.description: Latitude of the location. Default value is for Zurich, Switzerland

inputs.name: longitude
inputs.description: Longitude of the location. Default value is for Zurich, Switzerland

inputs.name: solarazi
inputs.description: 8760 time series of solar azimuth angles in [°], e.g from a weatherfile. If no data provided, azimuth will be calculated according to Blanco-Muriel (2001).

inputs.name: solaralti
inputs.description: 8760 time series of solar altitude angles in [°], e.g from a weatherfile. If no data provided, altitude will be calculated according to Blanco-Muriel (2001).

outputs.name: annual potential
outputs.description: annual hourly solar irradiance [Wh] of surface
